text: aur yadi kaheen hamane unhen aadesh diya hota ki "apanon ko qatl karo ya apane gharon se nikal jao." to unamen se thode hee aisa karate. haalaanki jo naseehat unhen dee jaatee hai, agar ve use vyavahaar mein laate to yah baat unake lie achchhee hotee aur zyaada zamaav paida karanevaalee hotee
